content: this pattern is an offshoot of my other beanie patterns suggested yarn weight is fingering/light sport the pattern features a corrugated rib followed by stockinette both in stranded colorwork instructions for varying needle size and yarn weight will allow for variety here as seen in the samples section and as described in the pattern the pattern includes two charts one that reads abolish ice and the other that reads fuck ice also included are extensive round-by-round notes as well as recommended tutorial videos a section of samples shows a variety of yarns used fiber information needles used final weight and notes on the particular yarn from myself and testers further notes go over sources of low-cost natural yarns as well as how to substitute yarns happy knitting abolish ice melt the ice
